summary: This bill, H.R. 1706, proposes to designate the United States Postal Service facility located at 1200 William Street, Room 200, in Buffalo, New York, as the “William J. Donovan Post Office Building”. The bill's text includes the formal introduction of the bill in the House of Representatives, the names of the bill's sponsors, and the specifics of the building's renaming. It also states any references in other laws or documents should be updated accordingly.
